title: Salary to Hourly Calculator
description: Convert your annual salary into an equivalent hourly wage.
methodSummary: Hourly rate = annual salary / (hours per week × weeks worked)
assumptions: Standard full-time year generally assumes 2,080 hours (40 hours × 52 weeks).
Does not account for paid time off unless weeks worked are adjusted.
insights: Understanding your true hourly rate makes it easier to value your free time.
People transitioning from freelance often underestimate the value of consistent paid holidays in a salaried role.

faqs.q: Does salaried hourly rate include PTO?
faqs.a: Yes, if you divide by 52 weeks your paid time off is effectively giving you the same hourly rate for hours you aren't working.
